Key Match Events: Grant McCray hit two home runs, including a three-run homer in the 2nd inning and a two-run blast in the 9th inning, marking his first multi-homer game in the majors
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Padres will play six games against the Giants within eight days, avoiding former Friar Blake Snell but facing All-Star Logan Webb twice
Others: This was Grant McCray's first multi-homer game in the majors
